snippet: Greece is beating its fiscal targets and will not need a third bailout from its international creditors, Prime Minister Antonis Samaras told Sunday's Realnews newspaper, confident that the country's debt will soon be deemed viable....

headline.print_headline: Greece Will Not Need Third Bailout, PM Samaras Tells Paper
headline.main: Greece Will Not Need Third Bailout, PM Samaras Tells Paper

lead_paragraph: Greece is beating its fiscal targets and will not need a third bailout from its international creditors, Prime Minister Antonis Samaras told Sunday's Realnews newspaper, confident that the country's debt will soon be deemed viable.
